attributes.action:
Save the Last WW1 ROYAL NAVY SHIP.H.M.S. PRESIDENT.
We dont want it scrapped
attributes.additional_details: In WW2she was use to protect St.Pauls Cathederal from the luftwaffe and as a base for french resistance..she was the last RoyalNavy Warship to wear victorian battleship livery..the HMS PRESIDENT TRUST is now apoealling to new chancillor.Philip Hammond to intervene and  we can help so please petition to save this last WW1war ship
attributes.background: for the future..she has been refused heritage lottery money and without help will be scrapped..do not let this happen..save ..H.M.S PRESIDENT.
